title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's requirements, including system functionalities, supported languages, and performance metrics.

title: Design GlobalGlossaryGenerator System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design of the system architecture, including database structure, APIs, and interfaces.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services to handle data persistence, API endpoints, and translation logic.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create a user-friendly frontend interface for managing and viewing the glossaries.

title: Set Up Database Schema
description: Design and implement the necessary database schema for storing glossaries, terms, translations, and other relevant data.

title: Configure DevOps Infrastructure
description: Set up and configure the development, staging, and production environments for continuous integration and deployment.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Integrate appropriate security measures to protect sensitive data and ensure user privacy.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create detailed documentation for developers, users, and administrators to understand the system's functionality.

title: Perform System Testing
description: Test the GlobalGlossaryGenerator system for functional correctness, performance, and security.
